website_summaries.verdict: An all in 1 smooth pumice stone and soap combination. Infused with shea butter and aloe, with a lemongrass scent.
pros: Ergonomic non-slip design that is easy to handle
Smooth stone gently exfoliates and removes dry dead skin and calluses
High quality soap ingredients includes Shea butter and aloe that aid in nourishing dry feet
cons: Not ideal for heavy duty calluses as it can wear down quickly on thick skin

customer_reviews.title: Wife likes it.  Smooth feet again.
customer_reviews.text: My wife’s feet look like a dried up river bed with all those deep cracks and channels. We tried a belt sander, 100 grit sand paper, and even a chisel. This seemed to work the best. Her feet are so smooth now and the fact that this comes with both a soap and scrubber is even better. I’m excited that my legs aren’t being scratched by her sharp feet in bed anymore. She would roll around in bed, and one of those sharp cracked edges would snag my skin, sometimes causing a deep gash.
customer_reviews.author: Milt Drucker

customer_reviews.title: IT'S STYROFOAM, NOT PUMICE!!
customer_reviews.text: How is it legal to call this a pumice stone?? It's literally just compressed styrofoam! Pumice is defined as: "a very light and porous volcanic rock formed when a gas-rich froth of glassy lava solidifies rapidly." I went back to read the description, and it does say it's synthetic WAY down in the paragraph section. But it clearly says "pumice stone" on the package, and it is NOT. I can push my thumbnail into the "stone" very easily and it's obvious that it will not last long. I'm annoyed that I was duped, because this looked like a good product. It might work while it lasts, but it's still NOT what it says it is.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Shaw

customer_reviews.title: disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: the first time i used it, The pumice stone was cleaned and washed very thoroughly and placed on its side to properly dry. the very next morning the pumice stone was covered in black mold. although I had placed it in a dry area and cleaned it thoroughly this did not help. the soap part smells very good.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your $ (or time)
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't do crap to remove scaly skin; bar is so slippery you can't hold on to it, to do what you're intending to do; then, the bar & scrubber become separated. I'm really confused wth this product is, how it does ANYTHING.
customer_reviews.author: John Lee Bass

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to look for something to help my heels for a long time. I don’t have the money or time to be getting pedicures anymore. I started using the pedegg that was okay but not the results I needed or wanted. So I took a chance with the charcoal and pumice stone combo. I love it! I saw results with the first use!!! I will definitely be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Zamarripa

customer_reviews.title: It’s  styrofoam!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s styrofoam!!!!! I don’t know what to say... it’s not something you could use for scrubbing anything.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Soap Refills
customer_reviews.text: I Love. Love, Love this soap, I have dealt with planters warts, dried and cracked heels, callus's, and burning feet for years. This soap and pumice stone are everything the description says. The soap is a great moisturizing soap and lathers well, it does not have a scent which is nice. My main question is where to get the soap refills if not on Amazon? I tried following a link given in another buyers review but I was not able to find this particular refill out of steamily thousands.
customer_reviews.author: Badger

customer_reviews.title: Nice but wasteful. 😞
customer_reviews.text: It was nice when I first opened it. The soap was a good lather before scrubbing. However, just a few days it gold moldy and ended up throwing it away. And it was not as it was left soak in water or anything. it fact it was stored ipright to dry it out after use. But the pumice just started turning black and stinky. It was really wasteful and I was a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: OmedetoU GozaimasU

customer_reviews.title: Useless waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The scrubber part falls apart too easily. This was useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha R. Hensley

customer_reviews.title: I'd like to think of myself as a masculine man -but ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to think of myself as a masculine man -but with some pretty worn out/unsightly feet from years of sports, military service and a general lack of foot care. I forgot how I came across this product, but it's pretty cheap so I bought it on a whim. Well damn, now my feet thanks me for finally taking care of them after all these years. I soaked my feet in semi-hot water for about 30 minutes, then scrubbed practically all of the callous off. No more painful cracks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I had some dry heels due to the cold from the winter and wanted to get my feet ready for the summer.. I decided to give this product a try and couldn’t be more pleased. Within the first few days I saw instant results. For those of you who said it was “too slippery” to hold, the product easily detaches for a better grip on both the soap and pumice sides and for those of you who claimed it “molded”, you do have to rinse it after use and place it in a proper ventilated area. I am happy that I purchased this product and didn’t listen to the negative reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Not Pumice, Not Stone
customer_reviews.text: So the soap side of this product is good, smell fresh, moisturizes well. The issue I have is with the other side; the "pumice stone" appears to be styrene with something that may or may not be pumice dust mixed in. How anyone can feel good putting their name on this product is beyond me, and to create a product this shoddy in memory of a loved one is appalling. I should have sent it back but opted to use the soap and throw the fake side in the trash where it belongs.
customer_reviews.author: meee

customer_reviews.title: Love THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: My feet are super dry & cracking, peeling etc. I've tried so many different soaps, pumice stones & lotions. Nothing seemed to really help. THIS Foot Scrubber Pumice Stone WORKS!! After first use I noticed a big difference, have now used several times and my feet feel & look 100 times better. I VERY HIGHLY suggest this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli F

customer_reviews.title: Use only if you like mold
customer_reviews.text: Used twice and then the mold grew. I purchased these for myself and my husband. We each used them a few time and liked how they worked. However, sometime during the second week after opening, I noticed a discoloration on mine. Fast forward a few days and when I was cleaning the shower I noticed a smell and upon investigation found what you see. These obviously are not intended to be kept for multiple uses, and too expensive for single use.
customer_reviews.author: darp8169

customer_reviews.title: A nice addition to foot care routine.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the convenience of a pumice along with a moisturizing soap. I have used it several time and it seems to be long lasting. I tend to neglect my feet for long periods of time so it takes a while to get my feet back in shape. I don't have cracked heels but I do have callus areas and corns. This seemed to helps to clear up my problem areas faster so very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My mom got me one of these for Christmas. I previously used a spongeable, which I originally loved, but they seem to have changed them and they don’t last as long as they used to. This has lasted over two months so far and I use it daily (sometimes more than once if I shower more than once that day). My feet are so soft and it smells awesome! I ordered this one to be sure I have one waiting when my one from Christmas runs out.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: MIRACLE WORKER!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! Because of COVID-19 and other family matters, I haven’t been able to get a pedicure in MONTHS. I have been using the soap and pumice stone on my feet during my daily shower and it has literally transformed them. My right heel had calluses and cracks and they were gone after a few days of use. I HIGHLY recommend this product. I only wish I had taken before and after photos.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Speeney

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've used it only 2 times so far and it has already made a huge difference! I highly recommend this product, will definitely be buying again! Thank you! If I could make a recommendation, I would somehow try to have a place, maybe groves on each end, so it's easier to grasp because it's a little hard to keep a hold of. Or maybe on a stick for easy reach. It's a truly wonderful product though!
customer_reviews.author: ~michelle~

customer_reviews.title: Great for the feet!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best pumice type stone that I have gotten on Amazon. It may not be a real stone but it gets my feet nice and smooth. I prefer to wear sandals in the summer and my feet can get so dry and cracked. This removes the dry areas of skin and helps moisturize. I don't use it a lot and this one has lasted me a long time. I'm buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthiablue

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't wait to try the charcoal soap version of My Solemate, and its a hit!! I love it as much as the others!! I am a diabetic and I also love love love to dance, so the Solemate truly is my Soulmate. Thank you for making these!! I feel so pampered and my feet feel so soft. I highly recommend, as I do all the Love, Lori products.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy G

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: The design is great which is what made me buy it but the pumice crumbles once you open it and creates a sandy tub every time I have used it. The bar of soap side has outlasted the pumice side which was Unexpected. I’ve also never used it before so I’m not sure if this is normal or not. I probably won’t be ordering again unfortunately. I wanted to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L.

customer_reviews.title: The pumice starts to crumble in first use.
customer_reviews.text: As of scent or moisturizing I have no complaint, I honestly didn’t smell any scent, but that’s fine. The thing I like is that the soap and pumice can be used separate. The bad is that after 1 use the pumice started to crumble, you could feel how it starts to “dissolve” or kind of crumble in very tiny pieces. The more pressure you put, the more you notice this happening. I honestly don’t know how long the pumice will last, but don’t expect any more than a few uses before I get to the plastic. Overall, I do not recommend. I was looking for pumice actually and this looked like a good deal, but is not.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer04

customer_reviews.title: Awful product
customer_reviews.text: Awful quality, awful product. Not pumice AT ALL. Has the consistency of florist foam, disgusting to use, and makes a mess. Absolutely unsatisfied, save yourself the money and get an actual pumice stone.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Was really looking forward to using this, but after a few times, the pumice got all moldy and mildewey and gross. Had to throw away and I hadn’t even gotten to use but maybe 1/16 of the yellow soapy part. Total waste of $.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to use!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! The soap gets water on it and gets saturated and makes a mess everywhere also making it impossible to hold. Got moldy where the soap used to be after three days in the shower, I threw it away! Would not recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: Ive been an athlete since I was a kid and my feet have always taken the brunt of it. Over the years ive tried different lava pumice stones. Those are always so dull. This one has grit and its rough yet gentle. It takes all of the dead skin off of my feet. I read some reviews describing this as magic and they are right. The soap attached smells great and its super moisturizing. Dare i say I use it on other parts of my body. Lol. Hey its soap! This foot pumice is a game changer. And it comes in the cutest packaging so everyone is getting one for Christmas. Easy!
customer_reviews.author: Zach T.

customer_reviews.title: Best Foot Stone Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: My friend told me about this product and i didn’t believe her when she said how well it worked with just one use. She wasn’t lying. I have tried many different pumice stones over the years and nothing comes close to this. My feet are softer than they have ever been and I haven’t had a pedicure in months because of the pandemic. Even my husband loved the product, his feet were so much softer after using it just once!. I can’t wait to check out all of Love,Lori foot care products!
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice M.L.

customer_reviews.title: Great invention, moisturizes and scrubs! One smaaaaaal thing...
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this! Soap on one side, scrubber on the other! It’s a genius idea! However, only reason for the 4-star review is that it kind of came un-spun and although I put it back together, it easily spins when I use it. Otherwise, great invention!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works on rough cracked heels
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. Works better than anything I’ve ever tried. I had dry, cracked, painful heels 2 days ago. All rough spots and cracks are gone except for one that was bleeding and was in pretty bad shape. I paid a lot of money recently for a special care pedicure because I’ve been dealing with this problem for years and it’s gotten worse recently. I bought this product based on the reviews and used it followed by Okeefe foot cream with silicone pads overnight. My feet haven’t felt this smooth and healthy since I was a teen. The one bad crack is so much better and less painful. I suspect continued use will heal it completely. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously! Why hadn't I found this gem before now!? I have seriously problematic heels and already I am seeing and feeling an improvement! I have used it every night so far and can't wait to buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Howard

customer_reviews.title: Pumice stone is styrofoam I think
customer_reviews.text: Ummm pumice stone pretty much devolves with 1st wash. Soap is moisturizing. Do not buy if you have really bad thought feet.
customer_reviews.author: kasha

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I was a little skeptical when ordering as I wasn’t sure how it would hold up after constant use. It has a little grip so that’s it doesn’t slip out of my hand and it’s so convenient. I used to put soap on my pumice stones and this just makes so much more sense.
customer_reviews.author: Marieke

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this is suppose to eventually come apart from using or because of the moisture in the bathroom but it did come apart after using it twice. It does work, just didn't like that it came apart so quickly, Incould just buy seperate pumice stone and soap in that case.
customer_reviews.author: LuAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted to love this product. But, the design is terrible. The lotion side is not thick enough to make a difference, plus you waste a ton of it while scrubbing. The scrubbing side seems better quality but lacks the ability to really BUFF your feet. This doesn't give you a smooth buffed foot.
customer_reviews.author: Chic Music

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure why this has such good reviews
customer_reviews.text: This thing is nothing special. The soap smells like cleaning product to me. It is impossible to hold once it's slippery. Better to have the soap as a separate item.
customer_reviews.author: alyshia

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like
customer_reviews.text: The soap was super soft so it just started to disintegrate in the shower and I noticed no difference on my feet from before and after.
customer_reviews.author: CaliGirl

customer_reviews.title: Baby Soft Feet
customer_reviews.text: I wear a lot of sandals so I started using this in the shower every day. My feet have been super soft and free of dry skin and calluses after just a week. I also have less foot pain in the balls of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Joe

customer_reviews.title: better than other stuff I've used
customer_reviews.text: I have used german heel razor blade scrapers, the ped egg, the mask, lotions, cracked heel creams...this is the best. I have had it and used it about 3 times and my feet are in such better shape than they have been. I'm getting one for my sister now :)
customer_reviews.author: Jacopochi

customer_reviews.title: This pumice stone and vitamin E is great!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida where it is hot and humid, as such I wear a lot of sandals and open toe shoes. I also have tile in my house which helps to dry out my feet. In between pedicures I use this and a cheese grater looking contraption, lol. Mt feet are soft and I am in my 40's.... My feet are like a baby's bum - I highly recommend for anyone who wants to slough off dead skin from their feet :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Barry

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I use the lemon version everyday and thought I would give this one a try. I had bought both and just opened this one to use. First day and the bar fell apart and will not stay together. It defeats the purpose when the parts do not stay together. I will stick to the lemon version.
customer_reviews.author: ks

customer_reviews.title: Effective and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this many times now. It is a nice way to clean your feet each night as well as getting some of the rough skin off. The soap is moisturizing and it sits conveniently on the tub. A nice product for nightly self-care.
customer_reviews.author: svfarb

customer_reviews.title: Best pumice stone!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pumice stone! It works wonders on my feet! I've just purchased my second one and I cannot recommend it enough. The soap smells good and leaves your feet super soft. I just wish it had a cover for the bar of soap portion. Other than that, it's perfect! :)
customer_reviews.author: R&V

customer_reviews.title: Clears dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure what to expect with this product and was pleasantly surprised. I used it the first time yesterday in the shower and I can't believe how much dead skin it removed from my foot. I applied lotion to my foot after and I was really happy with the results. The pumice left my foot soft with no dry skin on it, and this is just from one use. I have really dry feet and have tried tons of lotions, creams and foot pumices to alleviate this issue. This worked out great, I can now wear cute sandals without worrying about my ugly dry feet. I'm going to buy another one and one for my mother.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky100

customer_reviews.title: smooth feet
customer_reviews.text: This product was a wonderful addition to my shower routine. Since salons are still closed , I am able ot keep my feet looking presentable with the product. I also love the way it smells. Just be careful if using in shower. It gets really slippery when wet. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This thing is ok. A little pricey for the cheap material used. Don't know what other reviewers are talking about when they say that the soap smells wonderous. Doesn't smell like much at all. The pumice side works best to get the dirt off my mostly all day bare foot walking so that's a plus. But it doesn't really soften them or remove calluses well. Plus it's awkward to hold the soapy part
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the 2 in 1 Foot Pumice Stone Foot Scrubber And Callus Remover Cracked Heel Treatment With Lemongrass Moisturizer for a few days and what a (positive) difference it has made on my rough heels. LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: E. Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I have ever used!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever for keeping feet smooth and soft. Had to have surgery on ankle. Use this all the time. My feet have never been softer!! Best thing I have ever used. Bought one for my husband. Use it every time I take a shower or bath
customer_reviews.author: no name

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is terrible. It does not work. The soap/pumice combo is awkward. It molded right away.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have hard callouses but I did have a dry patch on my heel. Used it in the shower once and I have baby soft feet again!! It really works well. It almost works too well. I scrubbed a bit too long/hard and my toe was super sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my feet sandal ready!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Use it every day in the shower. It really takes all the dry skin off of my feet, leaving them nice and smooth. The only thing I don't like about it is storing it in between uses. I think a little cover with little holes so it can air dry over the soap would be perfect. Other than that it does what it's supposed to very well.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but it smells bad. It’s hard to hold when wet and the soap that’s on the opposite side as the pumice doesn’t moisturize or lather.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Mangers

customer_reviews.title: Soap and pumice stone
customer_reviews.text: The soap side smells delightfully of lemons. And the pumice side is much more aggressive than others I’ve used. This is great for people who are on their feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: Opal McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Love you feet and buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT! Woooow! My feet feel absolutely amazing after using this product. I would highly recommend everyone to try this product and use it regularly to have impeccable foot hygiene. Love you feet people!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Maria Farrugia

customer_reviews.title: Works Great :)
customer_reviews.text: Received this item today. I have added a picture of the box and what's basically inside. I have already used it as well so I can give more of a better review. I gave it 5 stars because it really works and makes my feet look better than it was before I tried it.. my daughter honestly said 'oh yay you dont have grandma feet anymore'... now that makes you want to buy it huh?!..lol The only con for me was holding it since both of the soap and pumice basically are together but besides that I love this product. :)
customer_reviews.author: tesa

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing to make pretty feet!
customer_reviews.text: This was so great I bought another for a present and one for me! Super easy to use and it seriously helped my cracked feet and calluses super fast!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Pumice
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one I've bought so I knew what I was getting. However, the pumice doesn't seem as good as 1st one. Still very useful
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Good product and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It helped a lot with my cracked heels. They won't get rid of the hard calluses at once but they did remove about half of it and the rest goes away after frequent use. I try to use them every time I'm in the shower and it helps my feet have softer heels every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: more like hard styrofoam
customer_reviews.text: The soap has no scent after 1 week and 3 uses. The oil scent was there when the plastic was initially removed from product. They must spray it on the surface instead of using in the soap. The stone is OK but sort of crumbles apart as you use it...not real pumice, more like hard styrofoam. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soothes and keeps feet fresh
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other soaps for your feet, and this soap is the only one that soothes and keeps my feet fresh. Other brands only do one or the other. This is my second time buying the bar after trying others and I will not switch again. This bar also is long lasting for scent and usage
customer_reviews.author: Garrick Vital-Herne

customer_reviews.title: Soft feet
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every time I shower and make my feet soft and clean. It is very convenient than putting on some type of cream or removal of callus
customer_reviews.author: Angela Barginear

customer_reviews.title: What my feet have been craving for
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for dry cracked heels and dealing with painful callouses. Will keep buying religiously!
customer_reviews.author: Neelia

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my feet like I just pedicured them everyday
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! It’s a must for me everyday! Keeps my feet misturized and the pumice takes all the tough spots away. I chose this one instead of the original (even though I’m a girl with no athletes foot!) just because I like the fact it has tea tree oil and it has bacteria killing components. Living in Miami (really really hot all the time)and wearing sandals, flip flops and lots of high heels all the time this is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Ximena

customer_reviews.title: It's good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: The price is too much for what you're getting. I've used it about 4 times, and the scrub side is more than half gone. No matter how you dry it after using in the shower, it starts looking like it wants to fester mold.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea for a pumice- to include soap since it is required for using a pumice. The soap is good and the pumice did a good job exfoliating. It was a bit awkward to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Meshnick

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I use this every time I shower and my feet are definitely softer but they still not as soft as I’d like. Love the scent!
customer_reviews.author: Davaun B.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this stone
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stone. I bought it to keep my feet feeling smooth. I use the soap also just to use it. It doesn't have a girly girl scent but I still use it. I don't have a problem with stinky feet. But the soap with the stone work together well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this on a whim and I love it. very easy to use and to store
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I ordered this on a whim and I love it. very easy to use and to store. Does a very good job. Comes in a nice little gift box and plan to buy more. Don't know why anyone would write a negative review. It does what it is supposed to and does a fabulous job.
customer_reviews.author: Bear maker

customer_reviews.title: Soap portion is unnecessary
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product but it's pretty gimmicky. I don't really need soap on one side and a pumice stone on the other. I like to soak my feet in Epsom salt and then use the pumice stone. The soap doesn't suds up either.
customer_reviews.author: KitKat

customer_reviews.title: Much happier with this than I expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: Much happier with this than I expected for the price. Not that my feet are not worth 12 bucks and all. But the soap smells lemony and fresh snd by using this each time I shower, it's definitely improved the rough foot issue!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. Ealy

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of bad cracked heels!
customer_reviews.text: Love love this I have been trying to find a product that would help my bad dry heels
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: After only three scrubbings, there is much improvement. I hope to get rid of all blemishes very soon. This seems a magical product. Thanks. Update. After three months of use, the product is at half its original size and is fast becoming smoother and less effective. I bought a second one, but I wish there was a way to "grind" or "sharpen" it, so we could use the entire pumice stone.
customer_reviews.author: David Salomon

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING! I have tried it ALL! The difference after just one use is astounding. Better than what I’ve ever gotten from a pedicure even. I even did a test between my two feet, spending more time on one than the other, no difference. My cracks were very noticeable since I live on ceramic tile and in flip flops here in Florida. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Great overall
customer_reviews.text: Love the stone & soap but I do not recommend storing this in the shower. The soap almost melts when hit with water. I stored it in my shower caddy without being hit directly by water & still had this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mzmelbee

customer_reviews.title: Great Exfoliating Foot Soap
customer_reviews.text: This soap is a two in one soap. It has the exfoliating pumice side and gentle moisturizing side. It works great in the bath or shower. It starts working the very first time you use it. Easy to hold and use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! I am a loyal customer
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! I am a loyal customer! I have bought this product for myself several times.. love it so much; I bought them for my boys teachers, being they are on their feet all day, thought they could use some in-home care for themselves! Also purchased for the others in my family, they love it too! Will continue to buy as needed!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Pucciarelli

customer_reviews.title: No,disintegrated in one use. Do not waste your $$
customer_reviews.text: not sure what the other reviews are about because this product is absolute garbage. I used it on one foot and the "pumice" aka Styrofoam was done to the base. Did not even get to enjoy the soap as the scrubbing side was absolute garbage. Worst product I have ever purchased on Amazon...that's saying something.
customer_reviews.author: JMG

customer_reviews.title: Grew mold week 2.
customer_reviews.text: One for me, one for hubby. Both grew foul smelling mold 2 weeks after opening and first use.
customer_reviews.author: darp8169

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few days and can really start to see and feel the difference and my heels were VERY bad before using this product. Now you can actually touch them and they are softer and smoother!
customer_reviews.author: cm3553

customer_reviews.title: It was too soft and too fine.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last very long and pumice stone basically disintegrated after a few showers. It was too soft and too fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cool IT Guy '86

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A GREAT HOMEOPATHIC-LIKE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend the Athletes Foot Scrubber Pumice Stone with Tea Tree Oil and Antifungal Soap. After several uses, my feet have become free of chronic fungus symptoms - cracking and peeling skin on my soles and in between my toes. It's like a miracle that i had no idea i could remedy this at home with this kind of product. I follow that process with their moisturizing urea cream.
customer_reviews.author: ChiNorseman

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I have never reviewed a product on Amazon before. It even took me a second to figure out how. But after just two days of use, I love this product! I am a teacher and I'm on my feet all day, sometimes in heels. My skin is dry, and sometimes my heels crack. I hate it! But with just two days of using both the soap and pumice (which is not real pumice, but fabulous none the less) my feet are baby soft! I will continue to use this product, and can't wait to see how well it holds up in the summer!
customer_reviews.author: luke j ahern

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I feel, pun intended, that this really works! Feet are definitely smoother & softer after using. Love the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Everything it claims to be and more!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a convert! I was concvinced all of the reviews were paid testimonies, but after one use I'm a devoted fan! I have really callused, rough heels and feet. What takes me almost an hour with a Ped Egg or an Amope took less than 1 minute with the My Soulmate. It is everything it claims to be and more. Definitely recommend. Skip anything with a cheese grater or a motor. Buy this first. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully it will produce the result...
customer_reviews.text: Because otherwise buying a pumice stone and moisture soap is so much cheaper. Bought it for my mom. Love the lemongrass scent. Can't tell if she will get such drastic improvement yet. She only used it for 3 days. Minus 1 star for not design a way to store it after each use. Would be great if it can stand on one of its side without the soap or the stone touching any bathroom surface (i.e., sink, bathtub).
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband. He works on his feet all day and not in the best conditions. He’s tried it and has loved it. It’s really helps his aching feet. He said I need to order several more to keep on hand! Thanks for a great product. Will be getting more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Angers-Hoffmeyer

customer_reviews.title: A magic “must have” pumice stone with soap built in!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. If you have any dry skin on your feet - a must have. I am a barefoot mama and have tried everything. This is the only this that has worked.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hooth

customer_reviews.title: Great product for improved foot health
customer_reviews.text: I really like this foot scrubber. My feet get dry from being barefoot and practicing yoga. I try to use this in the shower a few times a week. Since I started using, my foot health has seen major improvement! The two sides (soap and pumice scrubber) also come apart if you twist them.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Ritchie-Gruver

customer_reviews.title: Nice pumice and soap combo.
customer_reviews.text: Nice... not a miracle but pumice and a nice soap. Convenient to keep in the shower so I use it daily. Does it miraculously make your feet silky soft? I’ll give it a thumbs up for an all in one step and conveniences.
customer_reviews.author: desiree

customer_reviews.title: Better than the rest!
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin on my knees and this has helped better than anything else I have tried! Recommend this product! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Vincents Mom

customer_reviews.title: love love love this
customer_reviews.text: THIS THING IS AWESOME!!!! I've used pumice stones, scrapers & tons of other things on my feet & this is the best product ever. it's easy to use in the shower, it doesn't tear your feet up. it's just enough to slough off the dead, dry, even cracked skin on your feet/heels. Highly recommend this! Plus, the price totally affordable & free 2 day shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Idea
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work great. Soap is a little smelly. Pumice isn't rough enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carole A. Erlandson

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!  Works!
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this is that it's convenient to grab in the shower and easy to use. I've always used soap and a pumice in the shower. This is handy, no more switching soap and reaching for the stone, it's all there. The soap is moisturizing. I've used it several times. When it's gone, I'll order another.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great little purchase
customer_reviews.text: I put together a banya/sauna kit for my wife. This is a nice little add.
customer_reviews.author: JPD

customer_reviews.title: Product use
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, although the product is not 100 percent as stated, it still works pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Vi  C

customer_reviews.title: Only good for one use
customer_reviews.text: Used it day one and had good soft feet for a few days and when it came time to use it again there was mold on it even after it was cleaned and stored in a dry place.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: One of my must haves!
customer_reviews.text: Really great product that really works to soften your feet! Lasts a long time too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: The soap says tea tree but has no scent or sensation that it might have tea tree oil. Smells like an unscented soap. The pumice just falls apart making a mess and the soap after 1 use fell out of its holder.
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite thing.
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite thing. Going to be part of my daily shower.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: Meh...so/so
customer_reviews.text: Good idea. Fairly functional...Won't purchase a second time, but it's not a terrible purchase. Does a so-so job. Better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: This product actually work
customer_reviews.text: I received this scrub and use it one time and the bottom of my feet are so smooth and soft. I recommend the soap be separated from the scrub. I will definitely order this product again
customer_reviews.author: Tasonia Mcdonald

product_meta.title: 2 in 1 Foot Pumice Stone Scrubber And Callus Remover Cracked Heel Treatment With Lemongrass Moisturizing Foot Soap - My Solemate
feature_bullets: SMOOTH, SOFT FEET: Gently remove unsightly and uncomfortable calluses with the best pumice stone available! Love, Lori’s unique and effective pumice stone can be used with your favorite callus gel remover or on its own to minimize callused feet.

VERSATILE USE: This Cracked Heel Treatment Foot Scrub also works great on hands and elbows. If you suffer from dry hands and elbows, My Solemate can help. Just rub gently in circular motions since the skin on hands and elbows is more delicate.

EFFECTIVE TOOL: Lava pumice stones are often dull and ineffective. This unique, synthetic pumice stone sloughs away dead skin and will disintegrate as it works to rid your feet of hard, dry skin. The softer your feet become, the less it will wear away.

2-IN-1 TREATMENT: Unlike other pumice sponges that simply exfoliate your feet, My Solemate also cleanses them with a luxurious, moisturizing soap infused with shea butter, aloe and vitamin E to smooth and nourish your dry, cracked and callused feet.

AT-HOME PEDICURE: Save time and money on getting expensive pedicures at the spa. My Solemate is so effective, if offers guaranteed results in just one use! Keep your feet soft, smooth and supple just like a baby’s feet with fewer pedicures.
